channel.title: Quote on while true: continue
channel.description: Recent content in Quote on while true: continue

item.title: An Expert On Feeling Good
item.description: Their advice on seducing women was simply: “Become an expert in how to feel good.”

item.title: Born Artists
item.description: All children are born artists. The problem is to remain an artist as they grow up.

item.title: Civilization Advances
item.description: Civilization advances by extending the number of important operations that we can do without thinking about them

item.title: Abstractions
item.description: Abstractions that seek to simplify but actually complicate the system are called magic.

item.title: Concurrency vs. Parallelism
item.description: In programming, concurrency is the composition of independently executing processes, while parallelism is the simultaneous execution of (possibly related) computations.

item.title: Shame
item.description:
…And, it turned out to be “shame”….no one wants to talk about it, and the less you talk about it the more you have it.

Here’s what I can tell you it boils down to: …the thing that keeps us away from love and connection, is our fear that we’re not worthy of love and connection.

item.title: Naturally Iterative
item.description: Software development is a naturally iterative process that thrives on the establishment of effective feedback loops, and we deceive ourselves if we perceive it any other way.
